website_summaries.verdict: Packing the benefits of pressure cooking into a countertop oven is a pretty clever idea. Chef Puck's oven isn't perfect, and at $249 it isn't for everyone, but crafty home cooks will nonetheless appreciate its performance.
pros: The Wolfgang Puck Pressure Oven will indeed roast meats and poultry astonishingly fast, and it won't compromise much, if anything, in terms of taste or texture
cons: The dated design falls a bit short
Also, the pressure cooking valve on top isn't nearly as mistake-proof as it probably ought to be

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product on Dec. 5th 2014 and it has already quit heating called the manufacturer and their response was tough throw it away they have no repair shops and only a one year warranty. You would think that a product this expensive would have a little support!
customer_reviews.author: Donald R Kautz

customer_reviews.title: The oven spewed out a glue like substance upon turning it on and it leaked all ...
customer_reviews.text: The oven spewed out a glue like substance upon turning it on and it leaked all over the counter. My mom can't return it because she threw away the box!!! I hate when we waste this kind of money. Save yours!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Huston

customer_reviews.title: this is my 3rd one of these- they are very ...
customer_reviews.text: this is my 3rd one of these- they are very cheep- they seem to blow circuits. i just buy another one, once that begins.
customer_reviews.author: Doro Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Who knew? Great appliance. Responsible seller
customer_reviews.text: OK, first I bought a refurbished unit and it came SEVERELY damaged- like beat up with a baseball bat by an orangutan and thrown under a bus which stopped on the train track and was hit by the train and then got struck by lightening right before the flood. However I contacted the seller who immediately shipped out another unit less beat up. The oven works perfectly. its a pressre cooker , great for roasting, also toating and baking. It cooks quickly when you choose to use the pressure feature. It comes with several different pans and you can fit a pretty large bird in there... REALLY cool appliance!
customer_reviews.author: mz rose

customer_reviews.title: Pressure oven
customer_reviews.text: I really like this, though the box was dented when it arrived. The door seems to open with difficulty, I think the door might have been a little off balance, BUT the oven is awesome. Love that I don't have to turn on the big oven and heat up the house. This works with everything. Hint: A peach upside down cake took about half the suggested baking time, but it came out perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kyra fan

customer_reviews.title: I love, love
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for $50 more at the Wolfganf Puck site. I love, love, love, it. One of the first things I cooked was a ham. A friend bought it and I cooked it. He got spiral cut those are usually dry but it was so moist and delicious about fell apart. Scallop potatoes take a fraction of the time.
customer_reviews.author: TopsQueen

customer_reviews.title: Think Twice
customer_reviews.text: Oven worked great for 6 months, now I can't get the timer to turn off and if left alone, it turns itself on. So major fire hazard. Wish I read the reviews more carefully before buying this oven. Please don't buy this oven. Amazon should not be carrying a product that has such a bad background.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Harker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!  but then it quit.
customer_reviews.text: What a marvelous oven! I did a lot of research and read all the reviews before I bought this and I'm delighted with it. We took out an ancient double wall oven and transformed my kitchen into a wonderful place to prepare meals. Update: June 29, 2019 After nearly 3 years of this marvelous oven working perfectly for everything we needed, it just quit heating up. Power source is fine, oven was working fine, now it won't heat at all. Can't imagine what the problem is. Power light comes on, interior light comes on, timer ticks away, but it never heats up.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M.

customer_reviews.title: Basically scrap metal.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product. Broke after 6 months Control circuit board shorted out and fried after 6 months. Cannot replace.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: This product only gets a fair rating from me, ...
customer_reviews.text: This product only gets a fair rating from me, because the metal rack that comes with the unit is flimsy and won't hold up to a simple generic store-bought frozen pie, the pressure cooker part struggles to cook a frozen 1-inch steak, according to the instruction manual.
customer_reviews.author: William Robert Kuck

customer_reviews.title: Does not work.  Will not cut off.  Burned my food.  Have owned one that lasted 2 years.  This one didn't last 2 months.  Need ne
customer_reviews.text: Tell me what to do. It has a one year warranty? My e-mail is donnaapitts@yahoo.com. I need to hear from you real soon. I need this to be replaced or refund and I'll buy one somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Donna Pitts

customer_reviews.title: MUCH more than a toaster
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a toaster, My wife purchased this toaster oven instead. She did the right thing, This is WAY better than just a toaster. It doesn't toast as fast as a typical toaster BUT it does Sooo much more. You will Not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: K. Gorham

customer_reviews.title: Where have you been?
customer_reviews.text: I am in love. I have several Wolfgang Puck products, so it was an easy choice to give this one a try. It has replaced my stove, except for boiling pasta. It sits on my stove top. I have enjoyed short ribs, steaks, chops, veggies effortlessly with minimal cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: kajnsuga

customer_reviews.title: Best pressure oven ever
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this oven when it first came out. I wanted to replace it with a new one. I love it. I replaced my microwave with this oven. The food comes out moist and fully cooked. I am able to do the same as with the microwave or convection
customer_reviews.author: Natalia

customer_reviews.title: I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: I owned this for 1 year and worked great but after using it for exactly 1 yr, the timer knob quit working property, but i still gave it a 4 star because it does what is says it does, it cooks stuff at less time and meats comes out juicy. I was happy with it even though the timer quit working properly because I bought it the square trade warranty and I got the refund with no hassle, just make sure you keep your receipt or proof of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Meeech

customer_reviews.title: this oven keeps turning on randomly
customer_reviews.text: The oven was amazing at first but slowly it started to mess up on me for some weird reason. The oven keeps cutting on when its not in use and I have to turn it off again and its even gotten to the point where I and or my family members have to unplug in case it comes on while we're asleep. Hopefully, I will be able to get this problem fixed in the meantime be sure if you buy this oven to check it really well to make sure it's working well.
customer_reviews.author: rere m

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Timer broke in one month of purchasing oven, also the racks are not made well.
customer_reviews.author: Janice D. Mahon

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for 6 months then stopped heating completely. Seller won't respond to email and manufacturer only honors warranty when sold by authorized seller (which NY Select is not). FYI, seller did not reply to my warranty inquiry.
customer_reviews.author: Who ya

customer_reviews.title: Great First Experience!
customer_reviews.text: My first time using the oven was great, the chicken seemed moist and tender although it took a little longer than the directions said, probably because of me. With time and practice it should be great. The only down side is having the door ajar when you cook on the standard setting. That is not what I expected nor want because of the added heat and cost of operating the oven. Otherwise it seems like it will be a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Brand

customer_reviews.title: Timer stopped working and oven has to be unplugged when it is not in use
customer_reviews.text: Love the oven but, after use of almost a year; the timer will not stop when the timer sounds. It goes in the stay on mode. I have to unplug the oven after each use. That’s disappointing 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Onita Howell

customer_reviews.title: Wolfgang Puck Pressure Oven review
customer_reviews.text: classy well designed oven. be sure to read the manual before using it. it has features most other countertops do not - 2 levels of cooking: Seal vs Standard. it's a little larger than most countertops but has a lot more capacity. worth the additional cost of more conventional toaster/countertop ovens.
customer_reviews.author: mbmoto

customer_reviews.title: Gets Hot on the Outside
customer_reviews.text: The function of the oven does what it is supposed to do. Toasts, broils and bakes great. The problem is the outside of the oven get extremely hot and will Burn you. You must be very careful handling this oven while in operation.
customer_reviews.author: joeglo

customer_reviews.title: nice used it once cooks fast that is cool
customer_reviews.text: nice used it once cooks fast that is cool ,, But will someone help me with the instructions i just wanted to cook some chicken thighs easy but not reading and understanding some of the cooking instructions with adding water to two trays ?????

customer_reviews.title: opening the door after 2 months is extremely hard and ...
customer_reviews.text: opening the door after 2 months is extremely hard and the button to open broke. I need to return it.
customer_reviews.author: james lillard

customer_reviews.title: Very handy to have but didn’t last very long
customer_reviews.text: I bought three of these for Christmas gifts last year and two out of the three have quit working. The timer on mine quit working and the heating element on one of the others has quit working
customer_reviews.author: Jcham

customer_reviews.title: top notch pressure oven
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat this pressure oven for for moist, tender meat and poultry. The features are top notch as one would expect from top chef Wolfgang Puck.
customer_reviews.author: Capablanca "Pete"

customer_reviews.title: Marvelous. .  .
customer_reviews.text: I have in the last few days since receiving the oven cooked under pressure two stuffed game hens and one small chicken as well as a casserole in the conventional mode, all coming out perfectly. The fact that a chicken can be roasted in 35 or 40 minutes makes buying a store bought roasted chicken really unnecessary. I pushed basil pesto under the skin and rubbed all over the body of the chicken plus a season salt and cooked under pressure for 40 minutes with perfect browned skin and juicy meats. Next is Thanksgiving turkey done in less than 50 minutes. Hooray!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald L. Reed

customer_reviews.title: 8 months old and will not shut off
customer_reviews.text: Bought in March and time will not shut off. Goes all the way to stay on

customer_reviews.title: not worth the time.
customer_reviews.text: i bought this product in January and it already broke. The heating element went out in it. I liked the steaming part of it, but for $114 i expect it to last longer than 8 months

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleanup. A lazy senior
customer_reviews.text: Quick way of cooking. Everything taste as it should. Easy cleanup. A lazy senior.

customer_reviews.title: If that doesn't say we love this oven I don't what would
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pressure oven. My first oven died on me after a little over two years ago. We immediately ordered a new one. If that doesn't say we love this oven I don't what would. It's a great oven. Don't be scared of the price. It's worth more than what you have to pay.
customer_reviews.author: halmishoe

customer_reviews.title: I love my Wolfgang Puck pressure Oven because I can now ...
customer_reviews.text: I love my Wolfgang Puck pressure Oven because I can now avoid using a large conventional oven verses a counter top oven. Now I eat healthy everyday and at the same time I am saving electricity.
customer_reviews.author: lou martinez

customer_reviews.title: An excellent bargain over my first purchase.
customer_reviews.text: My original Wolfgang oven just stopped heating after 3 years. This one costs $114.00. I paid almost $290.00 for the first one. This door is definitely an improvement over the first one. It opens and closes much easier. This one is also more attractive, all stainless, no black.. I also received an accessory that was not included with the first one. So far I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one that I've bought and I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one that I've bought and I use it everyday. The first one lasted over 2 yrs before the heating element went out. This pressure oven is definitely a time saver and adds so much flavor to every meal.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Lawlyes

customer_reviews.title: Quite pleased with the product
customer_reviews.text: Quite pleased with the product, good shipping packing & good delivery time, cooks very well as described in the advertising. Although it cannot be classified as a pressure cooker, it does enhance the cooking by moisturizing the food with the small amount of pressure & steam produced with its sealing process. Would have given this pressure oven a 5 except that the oven rack doesn't completely fit, it's a little loose, causing the rack to fall down particularly when the rack is pulled out. I work around the loose rack problem by not pulling he rack out, instead I remove the tray from the top of the rack when the cooking is completed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great - love the pressure oven
customer_reviews.text: This will cook almost anything - just in smaller quantities. Not the best for bake goods.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Pressure Oven, Took the pressure off of me when my oven started to burn food.
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the price. Saved my Christmas. My over decided to go bonkers and burn everything. So, ordered this two days before Christmas and it was delivered by 9 p.m. Awesome. Recipes are delicious.

Will test that later this week. I just love the pressure roasting feature. I would definitely recommend the product at this point

customer_reviews.title: Wolfgang Puck pressure oven

I know I will enjoy trying different recipes in this Pressure Oven. It is quicker and like the versatility of using it as a Pressure or regular oven.

customer_reviews.title: Seller, Manufacturer  and Insurance Company do not honor the warranty on this Product
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase any products from Supreme Electronics! They are not an approved seller of this item! The seller will not honor the manufacturer's warranty they had posted on their Amazon Store sight in August of 2015. The manufacturer will not honor the warranty b/c the seller is not approved by them. I have spent hours and hours attempting to get a refund after I received a second degree burn from touching the exterior of this product. The seller is shady! The manufacturer is no better and Asurion will not honor the insurance policy b/c the manufacturer's warranty is not valid.

customer_reviews.title: All that I had hoped for.
customer_reviews.text: Love it but my only wish is that it was cool to touch, that would make a 5 star. Cook book but was fine but I only wanted the pressure recipes, so I sent it back ad am planning to get the other.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS OVEN, Absolute Junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Used it to toast 2 slices of bread, took forever, had to pull out when it was not done. Went to use it again and would not turn on. Finally turned on and then it would not turn off, had to put the plug. It does not turn on at all, this all happened in the course of 2 days. I can not believe Amazon would sell junk like this!!! Will never ever buy anything with Wolfgang Puck's name on it again. DO NOT BUY THIS OVEN!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Cooker
customer_reviews.text: This is the greatest thing I own. Love to the max.

customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRESSURE OVEN. I LOVE USING IT. EVERYTHING I HAVE COOKED CAMME OUT JUICY I RECCOMEND IT HIGHLY. THANK YOU WOLFGANG PUCK AND COMPANY. BRIGITTE BRITTON
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Britton

customer_reviews.title: I haven't used it yet but the reviews are great and the unit is really well built
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet but the reviews are great and the unit is really well built. I know I will love it Wolf Gang Puck is a quality chef and I trust n his products

customer_reviews.title: did not save time as advertised, can not hold a whole chicken
customer_reviews.text: It was supposed to save time and tenderize meat, it did not. It took 3 times as long to cook a chicken
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Valentine

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It scares my dog with noise it makes when in pressure mode
customer_reviews.author: Brent Luh

product_meta.title: Wolfgang Puck Pressure Oven
feature_bullets: The Wolfgang Puck Pressure Oven features brand new technology for FASTER, JUICER, MORE FLAVORFUL cooking. The first and only pressure oven.
5-function versatility: bakes, roasts, broils, toasts, and warms. This model does not have the rotisserie feature.
Pressurized and moisture-sealed like a pressure cooker to concentrate flavors and make it virtually impossible to dry out or ruin meals.
